title: Mysterious infection outbreak in Western Africa
bio: The Nigerian government has warned of a strange epidemic which has left 15 people dead and infected dozens more in less than a week. The Nigeria Centres for Disease Control are currently under investigation, but medical resources are needed. Donation to the local health services are recommended by the government.

title: Break the incoming asteroid by donating to NASA
bio: NASA recently discovered the approaching incoming asteroid that is heading towards the Earth. An operation of breaking down the asteroid is currently deployed, and the fund is needed from the public to continue with the project.

title: I want to play Monster Hunter World Iceborne
bio: I am a college student from imperial college London, and steam is currently having a 60% off on Monster Hunter World Iceborne. I want to play that game, but I spend all my money on buying cameras. Plz give me some money so I can play it with my friend

title: Homeless people in Oxford
bio: Every day I see a lot of homeless people lying on the street in Oxford. I feel sad for them, especially when it's raining or snowing. Please can we help them by donating money for charity in Oxfordshire.
